doc.after: Edward Said in his seminal postcolonial work Orientalism examines the encyclopedic endeavor in great detail revealing it to be an historically hegemonic enterprise Orientalists unremitting ambition was to master all of a world not some easily delimited part of it such as an author or a collection of texts 3
